root.name: Tiny Toon Adventures: Buster Busts Loose!
root.description: Tiny Toon Adventures: Buster Busts Loose is a game based on the popular animated series of the same name. The game features several characters from the cartoon, including Buster, Plucky, Babs, Dizzy and Hampton J. Pig. As you may gather from the title of the game, you will be assuming the role of Buster Bunny. As Buster, you will be making a dashing through six stages based off of episodes from the TV show. You will be ripping through the halls of ACME University, catching a ride on a wild train, jumping though the skies, play the last hope for ACME University football team, explore a haunted mansion and battle it out in space.

similar_games.game: Speedy Gonzales in Los Gatos Bandidos
